content: Set up frontend routing and Auth context with mock OAuth flow
Build three-pane workspace layout component (Inbox | Thread | Student Context) following design guidelines
Implement left panel: Inbox list with filter tabs (All, My Tickets, Unassigned, Waiting, Closed) and queue dropdown
Implement center panel: Ticket thread view with message list and rich-text reply composer with AI Draft button
Implement right panel: Student context with profile, editable notes, SIS link, and timeline of events
Integrate AI draft generation: Generate button → API call → Dialog with editable draft → Send
Add loading/empty/error states, toast notifications, and data-testid attributes throughout
Run esbuild check and call testing_agent_v3 for Phase 2 end-to-end testing
